item.title: @elonmusk: xAIâ€™s Grok Imagine has officially claimed the top spot in the Artificial Analysis Video Arena, leadi...
item.description: xAIâ€™s Grok Imagine has officially claimed the top spot in the Artificial Analysis Video Arena, leading the rankings for both Text-to-Video and Image-to-Video. This leap by@xaiputs it ahead of major competitors like Runway Gen-4.5, Kling 2.5 Turbo, and Googleâ€™s Veo 3.1. Beyond visual quality, Grok Imagine stands out for its native audio generation, a feature it shares with elite models like Sora. Currently available via API, it is positioned as a highly competitive option at $4.20 per minute, significantly undercutting the pricing of high-end rivals like Sora 2 Pro.

item.title: @elonmusk: Congrats to the@Neuralinkteam for helping many people who have lost use of their body with our Telep...
item.description: Congrats to the@Neuralinkteam for helping many people who have lost use of their body with our Telepathy implant that enables computer use simply by thinking! The next generation Neuralink cybernetic augment with 3X capability will be ready later this year. Pending regulatory approval, we are also ready to do our first Blindsight augment that will enable those who have even complete loss of vision to see in low resolution at first, leading to high resolution over time.
